item.title: About Me
item.description: I am Zhicho, a junior from China. My major is Mathematics. I like to binge movies. my favorite movie is Iron Man. I like to skate in the winter. I plan to study Finance Engineer in the future. Here is my resume

item.title: My journey in R
item.description: Exercise 1: Vectorized Code For each part of this exercise, a function has been written for some specific purposes using loop. Your tasks are: - To read/run the original function to understand what it does (the easiest way to do this is to run the function through an example by hand), - Then write the vectorize the function. (a) (5 points) Name your vectorized function specific_sum_vec(). specific_sum_loop <- function(m, pos) { my_sum <- 0 for (i in 1:nrow(m)) { for (j in pos) { my_sum <- my_sum + m[i, j] } } my_sum } Running the function:
